author: William Feuer
title: The 'patchwork' of state and local quarantines will prolong US coronavirus outbreak, former Obama advisor says
description: Emanuel pointed to China as an example for how to contain the spread of the virus.
content:
The "patchwork" efforts by local and state officials across the U.S. to curb the spread of the coronavirus are not enough, former Obama White House health policy advisor Dr. Ezekiel Emanuel told CNBC on Thursday. 
State and local officials have implemented a… [+2927 chars]
